panels.description:
High CPU load indicates resource contention or waiting processes. Spikes or consistent high values could highlight performance issues or bottlenecks.

Pressure represent the percentage of time tasks wait for CPU resources due to congestion, helping identify CPU saturation and contention.
panels.title: CPU Stress

panels.description: High CPU load indicates resource contention or waiting processes. Spikes or consistent high values could highlight performance issues or bottlenecks.
panels.title: Standard Deviation

panels.description: A Major Page Faults is generated when the system needs to load the memory page from disk or swap memory.
panels.title: Major Page Faults
